articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Brazil to host 2021 Copa America after Covid-19 chaos sees events pulled from Colombia and Argentina - Goal.com
articles.description: Belgium boss Roberto Martinez has slammed Antonio Rudiger for his "reckless" foul on Kevin de Bruyne in the Champions League final, insisting the Chelsea defender should have been shown a red card.

articles.author: Will Wright
articles.title: This Seminary Built on Slavery and Jim Crow Has Begun Paying Reparations - The New York Times
articles.description: The Virginia Theological Seminary is giving cash to descendants of Black Americans who were forced to work there. The program is among the first of its kind.
articles.content: The program authorized payments to the members of the generation closest to the original workers, calling them shareholders. If that generation includes people who have died, the payments would go to… [+1520 chars]

articles.title: Fox Nation honors military personnel with new content, free membership for Memorial Day - Fox News
articles.description: The 'Grateful Nation' promotion honors those who've fought for our country with a free Fox Nation membership to anyone who's served in the United States military. Sign up today to watch new content inspired by America's heroes.
articles.content: This Memorial Day, Fox Nation treats subscribers to fresh, new, exclusive content inspired by America's heroes and an even sweeter surprise for them: a one-year free membership to the streaming servi… [+4328 chars]

articles.title: Memorial for racist Tulsa massacre cancelled over cash demands - The Times
articles.description: An event to mark the centenary of one of the worst race massacres has been cancelled in a dispute over payments to descendants of three hundred black Americans and three living survivors.White mobs

articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Cancer symptoms: Six warning signs on your feet that may indicate a growing skin tumour - Express
articles.description: SKIN cancer on the feet 'often spreads before it's noticed', warned the American Academy of Dermatology Association (AAD). This typically tends to be the most serious type of skin cancer too, known as melanoma.

articles.author: Roy Luarca
articles.title: Wesley So hopes to make it 3 straight over Carlsen - Rappler
articles.description: World champion Magnus Carlsen and Filipino-American Wesley So arrange another title showdown in the seventh leg of the Champions Chess Tour
articles.content: So trounced world title challenger Ian Nepomniachtchi, 2-1, while Carlsen subdued Airthings Masters winner Teimour Radjabov, 3-1, in the second set of the semifinals to forge another title duel.
